Detailed Description

Provides various utility methods.

Function Documentation

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_BitwiseCompare ( FIBITMAP *  dib1,
FIBITMAP *  dib2 
)

Performs a bitwise compare between two images. Returns 1 for images that are the same.

Parameters:
dib1 first FIBITMAP bitmap.
dib2 second FIBITMAP bitmap.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

long  size

size Size of the array.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CloneImageType ( FIBITMAP *  src,
int  width,
int  height 
)

Clones an image type.

This function clones the type not the image data. Ie it clones the bpp, pitch etc.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap to clone.
width Width of the bitmap.
height Height of the bitmap.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* on success or NULL on error.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_ConvertToGreyscaleFloatType ( FIBITMAP *  src,
FREE_IMAGE_TYPE  type 
)

Converts to a float image even if the image is in colour.

Parameters:
src Image to convert.
type FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type to convert to. Can be FIT_FLOAT or FIT_DOUBLE.
Returns:
FIT_FLOAT image.

Compute a distance transform of an image.

Parameters:
src Image to transform.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* Returns FIBITMAP* on success or NULL on error.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_GetPixelValve ( FIBITMAP *  src,
int  x,
int  y,
double *  val 
)

Get the value of a particular pixel.

Does not check the position is valid works with all greyscale types.

Parameters:
src Image to get pixel value from.
x int The x position.
y int The y position.
val float* The returned value.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

)

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_InPlaceThreshold ( FIBITMAP *  src,
double  min,
double  max,
double  new_value 
)

Performs a in place threshold on greyscale images.

This function performs a threshold on the src image. An 8bit image is returned not a 1bit image. The new value is used for all values between min and max. Below min pixels are replaced by 0 and above max they are replaced by 255.

Parameters:
src Image to threshold.
min double minimum value to threshold.
max double maximum value to threshold.
new_value double new value to use.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_IntArrayReverse ( int *  array,
long  size 
)

Reverse a array of int.

Parameters:
array Array to reverse.
size Size of the array.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Is16BitReally12BitImage ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Return 1 if a 16bit image is really 12bit.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap.
Returns:
1 if the image is 12bit 0 if not.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Is8Bit ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Find if an image is 8bit.

Parameters:
src Image to check.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_IsGreyScale ( FIBITMAP *  src  ) 

Returns 1 if the FIBITMAP is a greyscale image.

This function returns 0 for 16 bit and higher colour images. It returns 1 for greyscale images or palettised images. Note the palatte could be colour so be careful.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP bitmap.
Returns:
1 if the image is greyscale.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_LongArrayReverse ( long *  array,

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_Threshold ( FIBITMAP *  src,
double  min,
double  max,
double  new_value 
)

Performs a threshold on greyscale images.

This function performs a threshold on the src image. An 8bit image is returned not a 1bit image. The new value is used for all values between min and max. Below min pixels are replaced by 0 and above max they are replaced by 255.

Parameters:
src Image to threshold.
min double minimum value to threshold.
max double maximum value to threshold.
new_value double new value to use.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* Returns FIBITMAP* on success or NULL on error.

int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.
